resources.string: Mention either a person or a city…
A basic mentions widget with as little code as possible.
Demonstrates how to set custom colors for your mentions.
Shows the effect of a simulated network latency.
Demonstrates using multiple suggestion sources for mentions. Person mentions have a 10ms delay (i.e. from database). City mentions have a 2 second delay (i.e. from network).
Shows using the MentionsEditText interfacing with a separate RecyclerView to load mentions with images into a grid.
